CSSList-style.summary: The list-style CSS shorthand property allows you to set all the list style properties at once.

remarks.para: The values of this property are applied to list items, including li elements and elements with {{cssxref("display")}}: list-item;. Because this property is inherited, it can be set on a parent element (normally ol or ul) to make the same list styling apply to all the nested items.

-Component properties: list-style-type, list-style-image, and list-style-position
